What's New in Version 1.2.5
 We're excited to announce the latest update to GymBuddy! This version brings a host of new features, improvements, and bug fixes to enhance your experience. Here's what you can expect:
 
 Upcoming Updates: Dark Mode Support: By popular demand, we're introducing Dark Mode to help reduce eye strain in low-light conditions and save on battery life. You can switch to Dark Mode in the app settings. Enhanced Search Functionality: We've revamped our search engine to deliver faster and more relevant results, making it easier to find exactly what you're looking for. New User Dashboard: Get insights into your activity with our newly designed dashboard, featuring detailed statistics and personalized recommendations. Social Sharing: Share your favorite content directly from the app to your social media accounts, including Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.
 
 Fixed Bugs: Login Issues: Fixed a problem where some users were getting logged out unexpectedly. You should now stay logged in across sessions. Notification Glitches: Corrected an issue that caused some users not to receive push notifications. Make sure your notifications are turned on in the settings. Crash on Startup: Addressed a crash affecting certain devices when the app was launched. The app should now start smoothly without any hiccups. Profile Update Errors: Resolved a bug that prevented some users from updating their profile information. You can now edit your profile without any issues.
 
 Performance Improvements: Faster App Loading: Optimized app loading times, so you get to the content you love faster than ever. Improved Battery Efficiency: Made under-the-hood adjustments to ensure GymBuddy uses less battery, so you can use it longer on a single charge.
UI/UX Enhancements: Updated various elements of the app interface for a cleaner, more intuitive navigation experience. We're continually working to make GymBuddy better for you. As always, we value your feedback. If you have any comments or experience any issues, please contact our support team. 

 Thank you for using GymBuddy!
